title: Does riot even look at these?
body: You know the ping is still really high for a lot of new zealanders. It was fine a couple of days ago and now all of a sudden, most of us have a problem? What did you really do in the network maintenance that made it worse? Why dont you just revert the changes.

replies.body: they check. my posts wouldn't get removed if they didn't.

We do check the boards, we are aware of the issue. It just takes time to fix. really sorry about the high ping, we are trying to isolate why specifically it is happening to NZ players. 

I'm not an expert on this field but I just wanted to jump in and let you know we are aware and we are working on it. 

Check out our service status page if you are experiencing issues - http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#oce
We also have a stickied post - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/rLiFIegm-updatednetwork-maintenance-24042015

mate the problem is, sydney and alot of places along the coast have gotten smashed by bad weather, parts of N.S.W have been declared natural disaster areas and as such, alot of people are using the network as a means of communication.

when we take this into account along with the fact the network has been impaired by service issues (broken lines, water getting into the copper network along with other issues it just continues to snowball.

Personally i think riot has done well to keep things going despite this.
Check the service status. They are aware of the issue

i think they check every so often but they don't really care considering there isn't much going on the boards so they just don't check as often, send a support ticket if you really want the problem to be even considered to cross their minds.. i just don't rely on them anymore.
